title: 2016 AMC 12B Problem 21
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ABCD"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be a unit square. Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Q_1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the midpoint of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\overline{CD}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". For "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"i=1,2,\ldots,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P_i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the intersection of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\overline{AQ_i}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\overline{BD}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Q_{i+1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the foot of the perpendicular from "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P_i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\overline{CD}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What is "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\sum\limits_{i=1}^{\infty} \text{Area of }\triangle DQ_iP_i"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"? "}]},{"type":"text","text":"
